input.sentences: there was a bird at the beach .
he really did n't do much .
output.sentences: Once upon a time there was a bird on the beach.
She liked the beach, but couldn't stand the crowds.
So she found a nice spot where she could be alone, but she stayed close to the humans to watch for stray french fries.
She stood very motionless and stared at the humans, without realizing what she was doing, she was so happy to be rid of the crowds.
Soon the humans were calling her creepy and started throwing her french fries, hoping she would leave.
